ABOUT_ABAAD.TITLE: Abaad Al-Erteqaa Office
ABOUT_ABAAD.DESC: At Abaad Al-Erteqaa Engineering Consultants, we have made it our plan from the beginning to handle large-scale projects with significant heights and vast areas, thanks to the expertise and technical skills we possess, the scientific and academic excellence of our engineers, and their specialized training in high-level fields.

DESIGN.TITLE: Engineering Design
DESIGN.DESC: Integrated architectural, structural, and electromechanical designs according to the latest international standards.

SUPERVISION.TITLE: Execution Supervision
SUPERVISION.DESC: Specialized engineering supervision to ensure projects are executed according to approved specifications and plans.

SURVEY.TITLE: Surveying Works
SURVEY.DESC: Comprehensive surveying services including topographic surveys and real estate unit sorting.
